attachments.text: The 2015 release of Photoshop CC rolls out exciting features such as Artboards, Adobe Stock, Device Preview, new export options, and much more. Read on for a quick introduction to these features...
attachments.fallback: The 2015 release of Photoshop CC rolls out exciting features such as Artboards, Adobe Stock, Device Preview, new export options, and much more. Read on for a quick introduction to these features...

attachments.text: Using Photoshop, you can export artboards, layers, layer groups, or an entire Photoshop document as JPEG, GIF, PNG, PNG-8, or SVG image assets. You can specify quick export settings in your Preferences. Then, with a single click, you can export image content in the format specified in your quick export settings.
attachments.fallback: Using Photoshop, you can export artboards, layers, layer groups, or an entire Photoshop document as JPEG, GIF, PNG, PNG-8, or SVG image assets. You can specify quick export settings in your Preferences. Then, with a single click, you can export image content in the format specified in your quick export settings.
